Pre-Game Insights: Sri Lanka, led by Charith Asalanka, aims to complete a series sweep after winning the first two matches.
The West Indies are facing a challenging situation in the series, having suffered defeats in the first two matches.
The inclusion of young talent Chamindu Wickramasinghe showcases Sri Lanka’s commitment to developing young talent.
West Indies have recalled experienced players Brandon King and Sherfane Rutherford.
Coach Daren Sammy has expressed confidence in the team’s ability to bounce back.
